Reviews.Title: Clocks Security Camera Mini DVR
Reviews.Author: Margaret A. Weston "Margaret A Weston "bu...
Reviews.Content: The reason I did not like the product is because they never worked.One clock never kept time or did anything else. The other one kept time only, it would not take any pictures or video.They never worked and I ending up having to return them.Also when I received them they were not safely packaged in order to protect the product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Records audio with video
Manual or motion detection recording
Looks and functions just like a normal table clock
ProductInfo.Name: Gaorui Round Clock Mini DVR Hidden Video Camera Camcorder Recorder Webcam Motion Detection Micro SD Card TF Slot - Silver
